﻿Dear {!Contact.Name}
Thanks for submitting your QFR for the period ending {!Case.Reporting_Period_End_Date__c} for {!Case.Provider_Name__c}.

For more information about the QFR, please click here
Regards,
Australian Government Department of Health and Aged Care

IMPORTANT: You are receiving this email because you provide aged care services, funded by the Australian Government under the Commonwealth Aged Care Act 1997 or via a Commonwealth Home Support Programme grant agreement.
